relation: rework Decoding table, add int64 and UTF-8
refactor KByteArrayView and add a row-oriented view
work on Tabs: add remove button, accept drop of url as load command
Add option to extend selection in Goto dialog
parameter dialog for "Copy as..." and "Export as..."
Status bar contains settings like cursor position or Insertmode
Make the service menu work (possibly doing it as a KonqPopupPlugin
Support for custom options from the compression interface (eg. a slider for selecting compression level for rar files)
Move kwalletmanager to the Model/View architecture and redesign the UI
